sections.title: Web Store
sections.paragraph: inPowerSuite® supports flexible shopping arrangements including direct to consumer (B2C), member's only (B2B), and party guest orders (B2B2C).
listItems: Flexible product categorization and display styles
Flexible merchandising arrangements for product offers (promotions, bundles, etc.)
Support for affiliate programs, club memberships, platform kits, product bundles, volume-pricing, up-sells, and back-order arrangements

sections.title: Order Checkout Options
sections.paragraph: Provides options for express checkout and real-time validation for shipping and sales tax.
listItems: New customer and new member checkout
Real-time address validation, sales tax look-up and payment
Auto-responders for order confirmation, customer and member welcome letters, and up-line notifications

sections.title: Autoship-Continuity Ordering
sections.paragraph: Robust tools to manage recurring orders and member retention programs.

sections.title: Replicated Websites and Tools
sections.paragraph: Powerful tools for members to create personalized websites and promote products and business opportunities.
listItems: Lead Protection: Visitors are tagged to provide the website owner with lead-protection
Simple Website Signup Process: Members are allowed to subscribe to their company’s approved personal websites
Website Compliance Monitor: Simple tools for members to create and maintain unlimited websites
Website Wizard: Company users have the ability to monitor websites, preview, reject or publish site changes
Website Autoresponders: Provides personalized electronic notifications
